channel.title: News on Nithin C Babu
channel.description: Recent content in News on Nithin C Babu

item.title: Paper on “Internal Embeddings of Multi-modal LLMs as Generalizable Representations for Image Quality Assessment” got accepted to ICVGIP'24.
Started interning at Adobe Research. Working on evaluating the quality of AI generated videos.
Our lab's research featured in Kernel, IISc's Research Newsletter: Decoding Distortions
item.description: Our lab’s work in the Department of Electrical and Communication Engineering was recently featured in Kernel, IISc’s Research Newsletter! Check out the article titled “Decoding Distortions” which discusses pioneering technologies for superior visual experiences, including assessing and enhancing image and video quality, as well as novel view synthesis and image reconstruction techniques using innovative algorithms and models. Read the full article here: kernel.iisc.ac.in/decoding-distortions/ LinkedIn Post: “Decoding Distortions” featured in Kernel

item.title: Paper on “Quality Assessment of Low-light Restored Images: A Subjective Study and an Unsupervised Model” is published in IEEE Access.
Our paper on “No Reference Opinion Unaware Quality Assessment of Authentically Distorted Images” got accepted to WACV'23.
